body:
I agree, nice resource...

I ordered a CDROM myself :)

Once upon a time i had a cdrom from a 'parts' vendor, that offered all their
products in DXF format, so you could order the right part. ( screws, pipe,
fittings.. etc )

Left the CD behind when i left the job, damned if i can remember who they
were. Having a 'standard library' again would be great.
subject: [Radiance-general] nice chairs?
